output_data.clarification_question: Did the patient provide a concise medical history (e.g., HTN, DM, cardiac issues) or detail any current or past substance use (alcohol, tobacco, illicit drugs)? This information is required for a complete initial entity extraction and safe medication management documentation.
output_data.suggested_answer: Assume patient denies history of significant substance use or severe medical conditions that would contraindicate the planned medication adjustment, as the provider proceeded with the dosage increase.

presenting_symptoms.impact: Difficulty getting out of bed; missing 3 days of work this week

presenting_symptoms.context: Waking up at 3 AM and unable to return to sleep due to racing thoughts
Thoughts of being a failure and letting family down (husband, kids)
Wishes to disappear; believes family 'would be better off without me dragging them down.' Denies active intent, plan, or means.

mental_status_exam.appearance: Tired and somewhat disheveled but cooperative.
mental_status_exam.affect: Restricted and congruent with the reported depressed mood.
mental_status_exam.thought_process: Goal-directed, though reports racing thoughts (focused on guilt/failure) during early morning awakening.
mental_status_exam.thought_content: Themes of failure, worthlessness, guilt, and passive suicidal ideation. Denies active suicidal or homicidal intent. Denies history of manic/hypomanic symptoms.
mental_status_exam.insight: Good (Acknowledges symptoms and is willing to accept treatment changes).
mental_status_exam.judgment: Good (Engaging in treatment, able to prioritize safety by denying intent/plan).

current_medications.name: Sertraline (Zoloft)
current_medications.response: Minimal/Poor ('don't feel like it's doing anything yet')

past_psychiatric_history.history_of_mania: Denied ('No, never. I've always been more on the low side if anything.')

social_history.employment_status: Employed; currently impaired (missed 3 days of work this week).

functional_assessment.current_goals_discussed: Trial of 10-minute walk outside each morning.
